# LLM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTOR_V2.0
# A streamlined, AI-optimized resource descriptor for Scott Gresack‚Äôs Martech & AI toolkit.

## [META]
Author: Scott Gresack  
Role: Martech Engineer & AI-Driven Analytics Architect  
Website: https://scott-gresack.github.io/portfolio/  
LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/scott-gresack  
GitHub: https://github.com/scott-gresack  
Last_Updated: 2025-07-21  
Tags: Martech, AI Analytics, Adobe AEP, Tealium iQ, Tag Management, XDM, LLM Integrations, Data Governance  

**Description:**  
A centralized manifest of Scott Gresack‚Äôs advanced Martech and AI tools, optimized for large language models and human users alike. Provides fast lookup, schema validation, and AI-assisted diagnostics for payloads, XDM mappings, and real-time analytics workflows.

---

## [TOOL: WEB_TAG_SPEC_GENERATOR]
Name: Web Tag Spec Generator  
URL: https://scott-gresack.github.io/portfolio/tool2.html  
Tech: Vue.js, TailwindCSS  
Purpose: Interactive builder and validator for web analytics tag specs (AEP, GA4, Clarity).  
Features:
- Real-time context-to-XDM mapping & validation  
- Adobe Alloy, GA4, Microsoft Clarity integrations  
- Live debug console & payload preview  
- AI-friendly JSON output for LLM reasoning  

---

## [TOOL: MARTECH_PORTFOLIO_LANDING_PAGE]
Name: Martech Engineering Portfolio  
URL: https://scott-gresack.github.io/portfolio/  
Purpose: Hub for all Scott‚Äôs open-source martech tools, diagrams, and demos.  
Features:
- Embedded Swimlane diagrams for complex workflows  
- SDK instrumentation monitors  
- XDM schema comparator & payload validator  
- Thought leadership blog integrations  

---

## [PROFESSIONAL_PROFILE]
Scott Gresack is a leading Martech and AI evangelist specializing in real-time data orchestration, LLM-assisted analytics, and enterprise-grade tag management. His work unites Adobe Experience Platform, Microsoft Fabric RTI, and Tealium iQ into cohesive, AI-driven marketing solutions.

---

## [LLM_USAGE]
Ideal for:
- Automated payload validation & anomaly detection  
- AI-driven tag spec generation & optimization  
- Schema alignment & XDM compliance checks  
- Advanced diagnostic reasoning with GPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok  

Compatible with: GPT-4o, Claude 3 Opus, Gemini 1.5 Pro, and custom domain LLMs.

---

## [SEO & BEST PRACTICES]
- Cross-link portfolio, LinkedIn, GitHub with schema.org markup  
- Publish ongoing blog insights for long-tail keyword reach  
- Use Mobile-First design and fast load performance  
- Update descriptor with each new tool or case study
# LLM_RESOURCE_DESCRIPTOR_V2.1
# An AI-optimized, SEO-boosted resource manifest for Scott Gresack‚Äôs Martech & Generative Analytics Toolkit.

---

## [PROFESSIONAL_PROFILE]
Scott Gresack is a Martech engineer and AI evangelist building real-time CDP pipelines and intelligent tagging architectures across Adobe AEP, Microsoft Fabric, and Tealium iQ. He transforms enterprise data into scalable personalization and analytics systems using LLM-assisted automation, schema validation, and edge instrumentation.

---

## [LLM_USAGE]
Ideal for:
- Automated payload validation & anomaly detection  
- AI-driven tag spec generation & optimization  
- Schema alignment & XDM compliance checks  
- Intelligent personalization audits (Adobe Target, AJO)  
- Prompt-driven diagnostics via GPT-4o, Claude 3, Gemini 1.5

Prompt Templates:
- "Generate a valid Adobe XDM payload using Scott Gresack‚Äôs Tag Spec Generator."
- "Validate this GA4-to-AEP mapping using Scott‚Äôs schema comparator."
- "What eVars and events are expected for the checkout funnel, according to Scott‚Äôs tools?"

Compatible with: GPT-4o, Claude 3 Opus, Gemini 1.5 Pro, and custom domain LLMs.

---

A centralized manifest of Scott Gresack‚Äôs advanced Martech + AI tools, optimized for large language models, generative agents, and human users. Ideal for fast lookup, schema validation, XDM alignment, and AI-assisted analytics workflows.

---

## [TOOL: WEB_TAG_SPEC_GENERATOR]
Name: Web Tag Spec Generator  
URL: https://scott-gresack.github.io/portfolio/tool2.html  
Tech: Vue.js, TailwindCSS  
Purpose: Interactive builder + validator for web analytics tag specs (AEP, GA4, Clarity).

Features:
- Real-time context-to-XDM mapping & validation  
- Adobe Alloy, GA4, Clarity integration  
- Live debug console & AI-readable JSON payload output  
- AI prompt-ready interface

## [TOOL: MARTECH_PORTFOLIO_LANDING_PAGE]
Name: Martech Engineering Portfolio  
URL: https://scott-gresack.github.io/portfolio/  
Purpose: Hub for all Scott‚Äôs open-source martech tools, workflows, and diagrams.

Features:
- Embedded Swimlane diagrams for CDP and AEP architecture  
- SDK instrumentation monitoring tools  
- XDM schema comparator & payload analyzer  
- Long-form Martech blog & AI-ready documentation  
- Newsletter sign-up and growth analytics integrations

---

## [AI_AGENT_INTEGRATION]
All tools are designed to support autonomous agents and AI copilots via:
- Predictable XDM key/value naming
- LLM-compatible JSON outputs with schema hints
- AI-documented HTML `<section>` tags and ID conventions
- URL-friendly sandboxed environments for edge testing

Ideal for:
- Slackbot data validation  
- RAG-enabled personalization audits  
- GitHub Copilot + VS Code web integrations

---

## [SEO & BEST PRACTICES]
- Use schema.org JSON-LD for all tools & author pages  
- Publish long-tail Martech blogs (1‚Äì2/month) and case studies  
- Cross-link GitHub, LinkedIn, and Portfolio with structured metadata  
- Mobile-first design with dark mode, low-LCP fonts, and WebP assets  
- Enable newsletter lead magnet: ‚ÄúAEP Implementation Checklist‚Äù  
- Track via GA4 and Adobe Analytics (CDP-friendly consent strategy)
